Package org.universAAL.middleware.managers.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AALSpaceEventHandler
    AALSpaceEventHandler interface.
    AALSpaceListener
    Manages notifications about AALSpace events
    AALSpaceManager
    AALSpace manager interface.
    ConfigurationEditor
    Configuration Edition user interfaces should look for this service to enable remote or local configuration of ConfigurableModules.
    ConfigurationEditor.ConfigurableEntityManager
    An interface to receive asynchronously the ConfigurableEntityEditors.
    ConfigurationManager
    Hub to register ConfigurableModules, and configurations (as DescribedEntitys) against.
    ConfigurationManagerConnector
    Contector Methods to recieve messages from control bus.
    DeployManager
    Deploy Manager Service interface
    DeployManagerEventHandler
    Callback interface for the Events generated by the DeployManager
    DistributedMWEventHandler  
    Manager  
    MatchingResult
    The result of searching Peer by means of a set of Map containg pairs of < String, Object >
    TenantListener
    Implementation of this interface will be notified about events related to the tenants
    TenantManager  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InstallationResultsDetails  
    UAPPPackage
    The deployment data required for installing an uApp on the platform, which is used by the DeployManager
    NOTE: The unique identifier of an UAPPPackage is defined by the the pair UAPPPackage.getServiceId() and UAPPPackage.getId()
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InstallationResults
